categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Bacara was a Chagrian male Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Around 3640 BBY, Bacara and his Padawan Kosh were stationed at the Kri-Ta Outpost in the Pelath-Ri Marches on Voss. Upon finding ancient Jedi technology in the old ruins, they were ambushed by Gormak and Bacara ordered Kosh to flee before being killed by a single shot in the head. Wounded, Kosh made it back to the outpost and asked a Republic citizen to complete the task the Jedi started.

Bacara was first mentioned Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011. He was originally slated to appear in game but the content was cut. His in game appearance is shown to be Chagrian in a datamined file on https://swtor.jedipedia.net/en/npc/master-bacara.
